ygData.subject: Re: Lord Nagafens Demise
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps you should separate the .sig from the message with an extended underline. ... From: Reedo  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps you should separate the .sig from the message with an extended
underline.
----- Original Message -----
From: Reedo <reedo@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 12:37 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lord Nagafens Demise


> From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
> Ah see I think I understand now. Please understand that when I said
"Cool,
> very cool." I was completely refering to the story about Lord Nagafen.
I'm
> sorry if that was confusing. I can see how that could appear to be a spam
> message referring to my signature file below. I had just read the story
and
> was on my way out the door yesterday when I left the post. I will try to
> take my time with my post a be more elaberate from now on. Thanks for
> helping my understand the confusion.
>
> Mark
